Chapter Previous Next

class gstTransformedBoundingBox : public gstBoundingVolume

A class that implements a bounding box bounding volume implementation for use by the PHANToM. This implementation keeps a representation of the bounding volume in both local and world coordinates. The world coordinate representation is kept up to date automatically and is used to optimize the checking of whether the PHANToM is within the focus of the owning haptic object.

From header file: gstTransformedBoundingBox.h

convertLengthsToPoints
convertPointsToLengths Helper methods.
transformBoxToWorld This method will take the 3D axis-aligned box, apply the cumulative matrix's rotation, translation and scale, and determine a new axis-aligned box that will minimally contain the originally transformed box It is used for sphereIntersectionP.
